meanings.definition: The state of being overly concentrated.
meanings.sent1: The overconcentrations of sugar in the drink made it too sweet to drink.
meanings.sent2: The overconcentrations of students in one classroom made it feel crowded.
meanings.sent3: The overconcentrations of toppings on the pizza made it look like a mountain of food.
meanings.sent4: The overconcentrations of stars in the sky created a mesmerizing view.
meanings.sent5: The overconcentrations of colors in the painting made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: Excessive focus or intensity in one area.
meanings.sent1: Her overconcentrations on her phone caused her to miss the beautiful scenery around her.
meanings.sent2: The team's overconcentrations on defense left their offense vulnerable.
meanings.sent3: His overconcentrations on winning the game made him forget to enjoy playing.
meanings.sent4: The overconcentrations on the task at hand made time fly by.
meanings.sent5: The overconcentrations on details made the project flawless.
